nodes.text: Star Wars: Droids is a short one-page comic strip released by Kellogg's as an Apple Jacks promotion.

R2-D2 and C-3PO are standing on Tatooine, talking. Suddenly, they see a monster approaching them. However, they soon discover that it is in fact Luke Skywalker, who is carrying some spare parts. He orders the two droids to load those parts onto the landspeeder, and the droids leave, complaining that it would have been easier for them if Master Luke had in fact been a bizarre creature.
